net.algem.config
Class ColorPrefs

java.lang.Object
  net.algem.config.ColorPrefs

public class ColorPrefs
extends java.lang.Object

Management of planning colors. When system type, preferences are common for all users. They are saved in node /algem/colors. Under linux, when preferences are declared at system level, file path may be changed at start with the option -Djava.util.prefs.systemRoot. Under Windows, preferences are saved in registry. At system level, only users with administrative rights may apply modifications. For this reason, current preferences are declared at user level.
